channel.title: Strange problem
channel.description:
When i try to run a server and log onto it it says
client handler exepted from local host: (4 didget number like 1412)
and it freezes my servers and i cannot log onto them... is there anyone that can tell me whats wrong with this?
ive ran virus scan and spyware scan and got rid of anything that was there but nothing is helping

item.title: Strange problem
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote=“n0vamage, post:21, topic:73246”][quote author=Aftermath link=topic=107646.msg1086867#msg1086867 date=1175645991]
Try Hitting Your Computer With A Sledge Hammer I Think It Will Help Because I Am Very Smart

~ Aftermath (Admin On 5 Servers, Coder On 37)

[/sarcasm]
[/quote]

yea ok ill try that seems like a good idea

[/sarcasm][/quote]

I told you already, whenever someone connects to your server, it says that, even if you’re the person connecting.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange problem
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Yeah, sometimes the server accidentally bans an account that does something that it’s not supposed to do. You could also try to re-download the source you have the make the changes you’ve made to it again.

Other than that, I don’t really know what to say about that.

Read full topic
